price: Na mmom obi a yεde ne Nwoma bεma no wͻ ne nsa benkum mu no, ͻbεka sε: Ɛkaa menko a, anka yɛanfa me Nwoma no amma me koraa.
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُوتَ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu bishimālihi fayaqūlu yālaytanī lam ūta kitābiyah
